name: HSA Secure
statementOfFaith: None required. Welcomes members of all faiths and backgrounds.

preExisting.sharingLimits: Up to $25,000 in year 2, $50,000 in year 3, $125,000 after year 4. Controlled high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and diabetes may qualify immediately.

bestFor: Self-employed individuals and small business owners who want HSA tax advantages paired with affordable health sharing
pros: HSA-compatible -- unique among health sharing plans, enabling tax-free savings
Includes ACA-compliant preventive care through MEC insurance component
No faith requirement -- fully secular and open to all
No network restrictions -- use any licensed provider in the US or Puerto Rico
No annual or lifetime sharing limits
cons: Mental health expenses are not shareable (tele-mental health add-on available)

aiSummary: HSA Secure, offered by MPowering Benefits (MPB Health), is the only health sharing plan designed specifically for HSA compatibility. It combines a special HSA-qualified MEC (minimum essential coverage) preventive health insurance plan with a low-cost healthshare powered by Zion HealthShare. This unique structure allows members to contribute pre-tax dollars to an HSA while enjoying affordable monthly sharing contributions starting at $170/month for individuals. The plan covers preventive care, telehealth ($0 consultations via Primestin Care), prescriptions (via Zion RxShare), maternity (after 6-month wait), emergency, and surgery. It has no network restrictions, no annual or lifetime caps, and no faith requirements. The trade-off is that mental health is not directly shareable and pre-existing conditions face a phased sharing schedule.
